text: Massimiliano Taddei, also known as Max Taddei (born April 18, 1991 in Pontedera) is an Italian professional football who plays for Lega Pro Prima Divisione club Venezia, on co-ownership from Fiorentina. ==Biography== On 18 August 2012 he goes on co-ownership to Venezia.MAX TADDEI AL VENEZIA violachannel.tv On 21 June 2013 Venezia buy the other part property of Fiorentina.APERTURA BUSTE: TOMOVIC TUTTO VIOLA violachannel.tv ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:ACF Fiorentina players Category:A.S. Gubbio 1910 players Category:Italy youth international footballers Category:People from Pontedera Category:Association football midfielders
title: Max Taddei
